text: Lim Byeong-wuk (; born September 30, 1995) is a South Korean professional baseball center fielder currently playing for the Kiwoom Heroes of the KBO League.https://mykbostats.com/players/806-Lim-Byeong-wuk-Kiwoom-Heroes Lim was a first-round draft pick in 2014 from Deoksugo with a signing bonus of 200 million Korean won ($180,000) and an annual salary of 24 million won ($22,000) Lim played at shortstop in high school but switched to the outfield with Nexen. He wears number 0 because it resembles the Hangul jamo ㅇ which appears in his name three times. ==References== Category:Kiwoom Heroes players Category:KBO League center fielders Category:South Korean baseball players Category:1995 births Category:Living people
title: Lim Byeong-wuk
